titles.title: To require the Secretary of the Treasury to carry out a study on Chinese support for Afghan illicit finance, and for other purposes.
To require the Secretary of the Treasury to carry out a study on Chinese support for Afghan illicit finance, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary: This bill requires the Department of the Treasury to report on the financial activities of China and Chinese entities in connection with the finances of Afghanistan and the Taliban, including activities to support illicit financial networks.
